explanations.machine learning: The paper uses data mining methods including artificial neural networks (ANNs) and other classification and regression methods, which are part of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves predicting credit ratings using labeled data, which is a supervised learning task.
explanations.classification: The paper mentions using classification methods to predict credit ratings.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions using regression analysis (RA) as one of the methods for predicting credit ratings.
explanations.decision tree: The paper uses CHAID tree analysis (CTA), which is a type of decision tree method.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses artificial neural networks (ANNs) as one of the methods for credit rating prediction.
